attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Do not download!!!! I just wanted to support our racist, sexist, misogynistic, homophobic, transphobic, orange president, but it took forverrrrr to download. I deleted the app immediately, and it took so long to get the blonde out of my hair and orange out of my skin. My skin is still kinda yellowish. DO NOT GET THIS APP

I bet you already see the issueâ€” the app would not load. It was 11:59 and I wanted this app to load so badly but unfortunately it didnâ€™t work. I missed the zoom and I canâ€™t cure cancer now.

attributes.title: Do not download!!
attributes.review:
This app is the worst app I've ever used. Frankly, I think that whoever designed it never graduated kindergarten. I can't find any useful information, it glitches to the max, and when I use it my battery goes down to 0% almost immediately. I think it also may be selling my data to the Chinese Government.
This app personally murdered my entire family and my cat. My cat, man! If you want to keep your information private, and keep your family safe, do not download this.
